panels.description: The Status panel displays the status for a given brick.
panels.title: Status

panels.description: The Capacity Utilization panel displays the percentage of capacity utilization for a given brick.
panels.title: Capacity Utilization

panels.description: The Capacity Utilization Trend panel displays the brick capacity utilization over a period of time.
panels.title: Capacity Utilization Trend

panels.description: The Capacity Available panel displays the available capacity for a given volume.
panels.title: Capacity Available

panels.description: The Weekly Growth Rate panel displays the forecasted weekly growth rate for capacity utilization computed based on daily capacity utilization.
panels.title: Weekly Growth Rate

panels.description: The Weeks Remaining panel displays the estimated time remaining in weeks till brick reaches full capacity based on the forecasted Weekly Growth Rate.
panels.title: Weeks Remaining

panels.description:
The Healing panel displays healing information for a given brick based on healinfo.  See https://gluster.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Troubleshooting/heal-info-and-split-brain-resolution/  
for how to troubleshoot healing and split brain issues
The IOPS panel displays the sum of IOPS (read + write) for a given brick path
panels.title: IOPS

panels.description: The Inode Utilization panel displays inodes used for a given brick over a period of time.
panels.title: Inode Utilization

panels.description: The Inode Available panel displays inodes free for a given brick.
panels.title: Inode Available

panels.description: The LVM Thin Pool Metadata % panel displays the utilization of LVM thin pool metadata for a given brick.
panels.title: LVM Thin Pool Meta Data %

panels.description: The LVM Thin Pool Data Usage % panel displays the LVM thin pool data usage for a given brick.
panels.title: LVM Thin Pool Data Usage %

panels.description: The Throughput panel displays brick-level read and write operations fetched using “gluster volume profile”.
panels.title: Throughput

panels.description: The IOPS panel displays IOPS for a brick  over a period of time.  IOPS is based on brick level read and write operations.
panels.title: IOPS

panels.description: The Latency panel displays latency for a brick  over a period of time.  Latency is based on the average amount of time a brick spends doing a read or write operation.
panels.title: Latency

panels.description: The Disk Utilization panel displays the percentage of capacity utilization for a given brick.
panels.title: Utilization
